> [sword00000](#comment_42_18yzU6FADirNEPhLVyRHBdnfVQaATfTk3S): There are too many degenerate, fat, and brainwashed people sloshing around in the masses. Unfortunately, a "Great Reset" is needed, and a lot of these worthless/spineless people need to die. Self hating Whites. Self hating men. Children without fathers, being chemically castrated by their single mother. Society cheering as violent Blacks have "Mostly Peaceful" arson and destruction of private property, theft and looting during a "pandemic"? [...]

I think your discourse is the most dangerous ever ! 

I believe that each life and even things was created by God himself. However like plants certain humans lack proper nutrition to really flourish ! As such, rather than see them for what they have become, and there I don't disagree with your assessment, it's more interesting to find the causes, and then wipe them, in the hope, like for a dehydrated plant, to recover them and then let them flourish to their maximum potential ! 

it's clear that the msn keep fostering the denutrional state by design. They will have to pay with their dares lives and assets ! 

I have kill lists long enough to not need to kill victims of a system designed to reduce them to this state to foster an un-natural competitive hedge for the feodalist rulers. For example I don't believe pedos, like the buddies of epstein deserve to live. I don't see that as a rupture of my first argument but as a complement, some have gone so badly, that their only hope, and for the others "plants" is to terminate them.


> [sword00000](#comment_42_18yzU6FADirNEPhLVyRHBdnfVQaATfTk3S): Don't throw away your life invain to try to save a crumbling civilization.

I disagree, Rome was saved many time, until it couldn't be anymore ! and that's the part I find despicable in your argument. By doing nothing MAO wouldn't have launched the biggest transition in all human televised history ! There is always hope ! and isolation doesn't work when the barbarians invade... be ready to see your little walled garden of eden to burn like the trash parts.


> [sword00000](#comment_42_18yzU6FADirNEPhLVyRHBdnfVQaATfTk3S):  Instead, be prepared. Exercise. Eat right. Study and learn something new everyday. Get your health and mind in 100% condition! Encourage everyone you love to do the same, and be an example to them. 

Those are great advices ! thanks for sharing them.


> [sword00000](#comment_42_18yzU6FADirNEPhLVyRHBdnfVQaATfTk3S): All empires collapse, and the sooner it does, the sooner we can rebuild. The stuff will eventually "hit the fan", and when it does, it's going to be the Armageddon of our nightmares. Those who are prepared will survive.

The problem is the invasions following collapses ! For me the best preparation is to leave, at least temporarly aka going John Galt :) ! 

Who i$ John Galt?

thanks for your post !
